name: Tank Team
overview: A tank shooter game created by Paul Ciulla, who has released both it and the source code in 1991. This isn't your average tank battle game, featuring original music, battlefields that make use of tanks, jets, rolling boulders, remote controlled gates and auxiliary canons and supplies. There are 13 different battlefields that are randomly selected. Setup screen for players to allow every game to be fully custom. Awards given for superior performance during the game.
